name: BSEF - The International Bromine Council
goal:
BSEF is the voice of the bromine technology industry globally. our goals are to:
Provide information and science the benefits of bromine and bromine technologies for society and economy
Commission and disseminate science on bromine and bromine technologies
Represent the bromine technology sector globally
Support BSEF members and market organizations in their engagement with policy makers and regulatory authorities
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Energy Policy
EU RTD Policy
EU Environment Policy
EU Industrial development and trade policies
